title.narrative: UBE AND POLICY SUPPORT

description.narrative: Key Education Officers at the National and Sub-national levels have increased skills, knowledge and strategy to fast-track the implementation of the UBE Plan by 2017, which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017, policies and programmes to achieve inclusive universal basic education, holistic ECCD and alternative pathways to learning are in place and effectively implemented by Department of Education and Department of Community Development.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Key Education Officers at the National and Sub-national levels have increased skills, knowledge and strategy to fast-track theimplementation of the UBE Plan by 2017

description.narrative: 21 provinces produced Provincial Education Plans (based on NEP) providing a framework for inclusive and equitable access to quality education. Capacity (plan, monitor and make progress) of 45 District Education Authorities is enhanced to initiate SDG4 monitoring at the sub-national level. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:13/01/2017
